name: Mix-Martial Arts
detail: MMA combines striking and grappling techniques from various martial arts into one full-contact sport

name: Gymnastics
detail: Gymnastics is a sport of acrobatic movement, strength, and flexibility performed on various apparatus

name: Karate
detail: Karate is a striking-based martial art focused on punches, kicks, blocks, and disciplined self-defense techniques

name: Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu (BJJ)
detail: Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu (BJJ) is a grappling-based martial art that focuses on ground fighting, submissions, and leverage over strength

name: Wrestling
detail: Wrestling is a grappling sport that involves throws, takedowns, pins, and control techniques to overpower an opponent

name: Boxing
detail: Boxing is a striking sport that focuses on punches, footwork, and defensive movements to outmaneuver and outscore an opponent

name: Taekwondo
detail: Taekwondo is a Korean martial art known for its fast, high, and spinning kicks, combining self-defense with discipline and athleticism

name: Muay Thai
detail: Muay Thai is a traditional Thai martial art known as the 'Art of Eight Limbs' that uses punches, kicks, elbows, and knee strikes with a strong emphasis on power and clinch fighting.

name: Judo
detail: Judo is a Japanese martial art focused on throws, pins, and submission techniques, emphasizing leverage and balance rather than strength. It promotes discipline, respect, and physical fitness.

name: Kickboxing
detail: Kickboxing is a high-energy combat sport combining punches and kicks from boxing and karate. Itâ€™s known for improving strength, endurance, and striking skills in both self-defense and fitness.

name: Krav Maga
detail: Krav Maga is a practical and aggressive self-defense system developed for the Israeli military, focusing on real-world situations and quick neutralization of threats using strikes, defenses, and weapon disarms.
